TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RectangleHotSpot extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot
Public NotInheritable Class RectangleHotSpot Inherits HotSpot
public ref class RectangleHotSpot sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpot

summary.span: 在 控件中定义一个矩形作用点区域。

span.span: Defines a rectangular hot spot region in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类定义中的一个矩形作用点区域控件。This class defines a rectangular hot spot region in an control. 若要定义的区域对象，设置属性表示的矩形区域的顶部的 x 坐标值左上角。To define the region of the object, set the property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner. 设置属性表示的矩形区域的顶部的 y 坐标值左上角。Set the property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner. 设置属性表示的矩形区域的底部右下角的 x 坐标值。Set the property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner. 设置的属性表示的矩形区域的底部右下角的 y 坐标值。Set of the property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner. 当单击控件、 页面导航到 URL、 生成回发到服务器，或不执行任何操作。When a control is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing. 属性指定此行为。The property specifies this behavior. 若要导航到的 URL，将设置属性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`并用属性来指定要导航到的 URL。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate` and use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要将发布回服务器，设置属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`并用属性指定的名称对象。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack` and use the property to specify a name for the object. 此名称将传递中事件数据时单击。This name will be passed in the event data when the is clicked. .. 如果你想对象不具有任何行为，将设置属性`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，这导致页后，可以将回发到服务器每次用户单击某个作用点区域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 每次用户单击其中一个对象，调用方法并向用户显示的选定作用点的坐标。Each time the user clicks one of the objects, the method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建两个对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到控件的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create two objects, set their properties, and add them to the control's collection. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Cstr/CS/rectanglehotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Cstr/VB/rectanglehotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Bottom { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置矩形区域底边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 对象定义。

span.span: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object.

value.span: 矩形区域底边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 对象定义。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的底边的 y 坐标对象。The property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object. 若要完全定义对象，你必须指定一个值，此属性和， ，和属性。To completely define a object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 一个以声明方式创建对象及其属性，包括属性，以声明方式设置。One object is created declaratively and its properties, including the property, are set declaratively. 其他以编程方式创建对象及其属性，包括属性，以编程方式设置。The other object is created programmatically and its properties, including the property, are set programmatically. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.Top#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Top/CS/rectanglehotspot.topcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.Top#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Top/VB/rectanglehotspot.topvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetCoordinates() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetCoordinates () As String

summary.span: 返回一个字符串，该字符串表示 对象左上角和右下角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the x -and y-coordinates of a object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.

returns.span: 一个字符串，表示 对象左上角和右下角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标。

span.span: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个字符串，表示的坐标对象的左上角和其下的坐标右下角。This method returns a string that represents the coordinates of a object's top left corner and the coordinates of its bottom right corner. 此方法使用的值分配给和要返回的前几位的坐标属性左上角。This method uses the values assigned to the and properties to return the coordinates for the top left corner. 它将使用分配给值和要返回的坐标底部右下角属性。It uses the values assigned to the and properties to return the coordinates for the bottom right corner. 方法为内部 ASP.NET 可用于获取要使用的坐标的文本呈现时。The method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a when it is rendered. 返回的字符串为特定于浏览器和标记语言。The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，这导致页后，可以将回发到服务器每次用户单击某个作用点区域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 每次用户单击其中一个对象，调用方法并向用户显示的选定作用点的坐标。Each time the user clicks one of the objects, the method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/CS/rectanglehotspot.getcoordinatescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/VB/rectanglehotspot.getcoordinatesvb.aspx#1)]
